interpretation.low: Low hemoglobin may indicate anemia. Common causes include iron deficiency, vitamin B12 deficiency, or chronic disease.
interpretation.high: High hemoglobin may indicate dehydration, smoking, or living at high altitude. Rarely, it can indicate polycythemia.
interpretation.critical_low: CRITICAL: Severely low hemoglobin requires immediate medical attention. Risk of organ damage.
interpretation.critical_high: CRITICAL: Severely elevated hemoglobin. Consult a doctor immediately.

interpretation.low: Low blood sugar (hypoglycemia). May cause dizziness, confusion. If diabetic, adjust medication with doctor.
interpretation.high: Elevated fasting glucose. Values 100-125 mg/dL suggest prediabetes. ≥126 mg/dL may indicate diabetes.
interpretation.critical_low: CRITICAL: Severe hypoglycemia. Risk of seizures or unconsciousness. Seek immediate help.
interpretation.critical_high: CRITICAL: Extremely high glucose. Risk of diabetic ketoacidosis. Emergency medical attention required.

interpretation.low: Low creatinine is uncommon and may indicate low muscle mass or liver disease.
interpretation.high: Elevated creatinine suggests reduced kidney function. May indicate chronic kidney disease or acute kidney injury.
interpretation.critical_high: CRITICAL: Severely elevated creatinine. Kidney failure possible. Immediate medical evaluation required.

interpretation.low: Low cholesterol is generally good, but very low levels (<120) may need evaluation.
interpretation.high: Elevated cholesterol (200-239 mg/dL borderline, ≥240 high). Increases heart disease risk. Lifestyle changes recommended.
interpretation.critical_high: CRITICAL: Very high cholesterol. Significant cardiovascular risk. Consult doctor for medication.

interpretation.low: Low TSH may indicate hyperthyroidism (overactive thyroid). Symptoms: weight loss, rapid heartbeat, anxiety.
interpretation.high: High TSH may indicate hypothyroidism (underactive thyroid). Symptoms: fatigue, weight gain, cold intolerance.
interpretation.critical_low: CRITICAL: Severely low TSH. Thyroid storm risk. Immediate endocrinologist consultation needed.
interpretation.critical_high: CRITICAL: Severely elevated TSH. Severe hypothyroidism. Medical attention required.
